title: ML: F1 Score
story: F1 score is the harmonic mean of precision and recall. It balances both metrics, useful when you care about both false positives and false negatives.
instructions: Calculate F1 score from precision=0.75 and recall=0.6. Formula: F1 = 2 * (precision * recall) / (precision + recall). Print rounded to 3 decimals.
starterCode:
import numpy as np

precision = 0.75
recall = 0.6

f1 = 2 * (precision * recall) / (precision + recall)

print(round(f1, 3))
solutionHidden:
import numpy as np

precision = 0.75
recall = 0.6

f1 = 2 * (precision * recall) / (precision + recall)

print(round(f1, 3))
